alert.note: Alert for Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 1:59PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast North Dakota, including the following counties, Benson, Cavalier, Nelson, Ramsey, Towner and Walsh. * WHEN...Until 600 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 159 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported road closures due to heavy rain and flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cando, Munich, Edmore, Adams, Bisbee, Starkweather, Rocklake, Lankin, Dahlen, Brocket, Hampden, Webster, Clyde, Fairdale, Alsen, Wales, Lawton, Egeland, Sarles and Calio.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
